name: Nemo Chipper Seat
description:
You never know when you want a seat cushion. Toss this reclaimed foam pad in your pack for a comfy, insulated surface to sit or kneel on. Each one has a unique appearance, so you'll never see another one exactly like yours.Made from recycled closed cell foam scraps from other pads.Egg carton texture provides cushioning and warmth.Accordion-style fold keeps it compact.R-value is 2.

        Sustainability
